author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Back in 2012 support for i386 CPUs were dropped and back a few years ago there was talk to drop i486 support but that didn't end up going through so now there's another shot at making this happen.

title: Is Linux Finally Killing 35 Year Old x86 CPUs
